channel.title: Goudont - Final release. Noob Friendly | Quests | Minigames | All 25 skills
channel.description:
Well, peace out Goudont era. You did me well.
de kerdits: Dragonkk (for client and stuff) Kennelz (appreciate his knowledge) K-shan (of course, this man always helps me. Insane coder tbh) Aviboss (other owner) Disvirus (Special mention) Cody Spielvogel(Special mention) MezzyScape (Base)
and DEFINITELY Greco loco. Greco's my motivation for making rsps.
[b][size=14pt] For people having eclipse character file unavailable issues (follow this instruction to use the server with eclipse)[/b] [quote="superpersonxd"]problem: error loading your profile
solution: update the xstream jar http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/com/thoughtworks/xstream/xstream-distribution/1.4.8/xstream-distribution-1.4.8-bin.zip[/quote]
[b][size=14pt] For getting rid of the log4j message (it's not an error nor is it interfering with how the server runs):
[spoiler][quote="superpersonxd"]Optional fix for log4j. Make a new directory in the server folder called properties and in that directory make a new file called log4j.properties. Fill the file with the following
[code] # Set root logger level to DEBUG and its only appender to A1. log4j.rootLogger=FATAL, A1
# A1 is set to be a ConsoleAppender. log4j.appender.A1=org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender
# A1 uses PatternLayout. log4j.appender.A1.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout log4j.appender.A1.layout.ConversionPattern=%-4r [%t] %-5p %c %x - %m%n [/code]
Append the new directory to the classpath when you launch
[code] java -classpath bin;deps/*;properties; com.rs2hd.Main [/code]
P.S: Also you CAN use this release with eclipse[/quote] [/spoiler]
[b][size=14pt]Please read the "Read me for basic stuff.txt" file for basic set up before you post here for help. Otherwise, please comment criticism or comments and/or vote at the poll for what you think![/size][/b]
This is it, the final release. I was going to stop at V4, but people asked me to continue (damn, I feel special alright.) But, I got lazy, this is what I came up with. But, this is not a big one, it's just V4 with bug fixes and some sexy new features.
[Source]: [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/68908723/Main%20server.zip]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/68908723/Main%20server.zip[/url]
[Client]: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/68908723/fixedclient.rar
[spoiler=Spoiler for V4]https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=637421.0[/spoiler]
[Combat] + insta-kill throwing axe added (but not in shop) [Thanks to Disvirus for the motivation and idea to add it] --> You have to make a way for players to access it. Original idea was to put it in member shop but I never got around to it. The item exists, but it's not in shops, and the price is 1 gp. You can change that + New hell run section (Hard training ground) + advanced weapon shop + Magic teleports (Varrock, lumbridge, falador teleport buttons) now give experience
[Event] + Dialogues for quest no longer interfere with other dialogues + Removed some teleport commands for realistic play + made npcs teleport you instead + New tutorial island (trapped on an island, more fun atmosphere) + added a dialogue for quest cape + Waldo npc, add in for hide and seek event. (Lmfao, I was high.) [The dialogue is already added, you just have to add the ints and rewards
[NPCs] + Fixed the npcs not dropping items + Added Strider npc which is a teleport npc for combat + Added Slifer npc (same concept as strider) for skilling teleports + 1 click interaction works + Added onyx drop from tzhaar npcs
[Minigames] + Beacon minigame is more automatic for players + Beacon rewards now give boosted firemaking exp
[Skilling] + Bonfires are now automatic (click fire address cube and it performs bonfires) + Construction bench added + Made leveling up give server points based on the levels you are at (EG; under level 40, gives 5 server points, above 40 gives 25 server points, above 100 gives 200 server points)
[Misc] + Changed 126/99 bug in skills tab to 126/126 + Play time is steady now + Skrillaphat npc gives cape now + Shop buying glitches fixed + Home changed to Grand Exchange (upon request) + Torva Effects added (Operate Torva Armour when wearing all pieces) [Healing occurs automatically after activated] --> I wasn't sure how torva effect worked, sorry lmfao + Godmode now gives 188 (10+ bonus to max combat, appears as 700 in player list) Combat level and crazy hitpoints + Dropping items now works + Some new shops
[Server files] + ;;admincommands fixed (AdminCommands.java fixed) + ButtonHandler.java (alternate actionbuttonpackethandler) + Dialogue npc face animations are now easier access (instead of ID of the emotion, you put the emotion) EG; sad, worried, happy, calm
[img]http://s4.postimg.org/ku9xvcbrh/image.png[/img] [img]http://s4.postimg.org/ikltkl2tp/image.png[/img] [img]http://s4.postimg.org/mxkd30bkd/image.png[/img] [img]http://s4.postimg.org/a12fmtuh9/image.png[/img] [img]http://s4.postimg.org/gvcqcin4d/image.png[/img] [img]http://s4.postimg.org/iyn5k6mx9/image.png[/img] [img]http://s4.postimg.org/scy5139fx/image.png[/img] [img]http://s4.postimg.org/kwtti6ff1/image.png[/img] [img]http://s4.postimg.org/wncswoej1/image.png[/img] [img]http://s4.postimg.org/96fw0smml/s10.png[/img]

@goudont wrote:

[quote=“des627, post:129, topic:544767”]Thanks for the answers. I will play around and try to figure out how to code some regular fishing spots.
And I will also look for a way to code in opening doors/gates.

Looks nice so far.[/quote]

thank you, and good luck! have fun with it

[quote=“Scythoro, post:130, topic:544767”]Thanks for the effort put into this.

I compiled the server and client using the JDK 6 linked in the readme file. When I log into a character for a second time, the screen goes black. Any suggestions?[/quote]

sorry for the late reply;
could you please elaborate more? is it right after you extract the source or did you add something in? are you using the correct client ?

item.title: Goudont - Final release. Noob Friendly | Quests | Minigames | All 25 skills
item.dc:creator: @goudont goudont
item.description:
@goudont wrote:

Krugiztar:

Amazing! Just what I was looking for, easy to isntall, easy to use, perfect! Thank you so much! <33

much appreciated, homie!

[quote=“des627, post:127, topic:544767”]Just two quick questions about Fishing spots and locked doors. When traveling around I see the fishing icon on the map, but no fish… Is this just something I have to add in and how do I add it?
And so many locked doors… Is this also something I have to change in code or is there a way to unlock doors that I am just missing? If code, where do I change?

thanks for any help. I am very new to this and trying to learn more each day.[/quote]

fishing spots should be at the fishing teleport. I didn’t add fishing spots in EVERY SINGLE location cause that’d take way too long. I think there was another method but I’m not gonna bother with that haha. You have to place them and add the position code for it, unfortunately. Unless you use the fishing teleport.

and by locked doors; do you mean doors that are unopened? If so, then no I haven’t added the code for that, I usually just do the “hop-to-the-other-side” method. Sorry if this doesn’t help, but it’s what I got for now, good luck!

Read full topic

item.title: Goudont - Final release. Noob Friendly | Quests | Minigames | All 25 skills
item.dc:creator: @goudont goudont
item.description:
@goudont wrote:

[quote=“Venom Soul, post:124, topic:544767”]How to edit item prices like for donator store if im trying to add new items to it, for example i want to add
torva, but how do i set the price for it in donator points? Also to allow someone to play with me, i have to go to Client folder - ClientSettings.java and edit public static final String ip = “127.0.0.1”; to my ip, portforward my Ip and just with winrar send it to someone?
Maybe you can give me any tuts on jarring it[/quote]

Shop.java (singular) to set the items in donator shop as well as setting the price for it. To make the price display, change it in data>prices.cfg – there will be 3 sets of numbers per item ID. change the first one to the price to make it display (it’ll say “Item costs ## points”)
but to make the actual price of it, you’ll have to change it in Shop.java

To make someone else connect to you, you’ll need to portforward your router to 43594 and then change the ip address in ClientSettings, yes. You could also jar the client and send it (I’d suggest it to hide client files), but if you prefer rarring it, when go for it =]

Read full topic

item.title: Goudont - Final release. Noob Friendly | Quests | Minigames | All 25 skills
item.dc:creator: @Venom_Soul Venom Soul
item.description:
@Venom_Soul wrote:

your kind words make me tingly in special places

You can use the command ;;donatorzone to get to the donator zone. For the rights being reset to 0, you have to replace my name with yours in ActionSender.java . it’s an anti-hack method (basic), for in case someone tries to make themselves staff without your consent. You can only get staff via command through the owner. To set yourself as owner, replace my name in ActionSender.java and the command files.

I hope you’re using this link that’s in this thread, cause this is the most updated source. I hope you learn a lot from this source and have fun with it, just as much as I did.

Good luck!

Thank you sm! Works perfect, good job working so hard on server haha even anti-hacking system added

Read full topic

item.title: Goudont - Final release. Noob Friendly | Quests | Minigames | All 25 skills
item.dc:creator: @goudont goudont
item.description:
@goudont wrote:

[quote=“Venom Soul, post:119, topic:544767”]Can i ask you where do i spend Donator points on your V4 prixable server, because I can’t find any shops set at home location, i checked the shops list and found somekind of donator shop with items added, but no idea where is it?! Also i need help with setting player rights! Everytime i edit rights to 1 or any other number for any player, whenever i login it auto resets to 0! PLEASE REPLY AS SOON AS YOU READ THIS!
Thank you

P.S. I really preciate your work, its the best one i have found out of tons of them, downloaded most of sources in google probably and this is the best one, you seem like pro coder that you can answer all or atleast most of all the errors and questions here, and coded this server, etc. Im hoping for help from you Goudont! :)[/quote]

your kind words make me tingly in special places

You can use the command ;;donatorzone to get to the donator zone. For the rights being reset to 0, you have to replace my name with yours in ActionSender.java . it’s an anti-hack method (basic), for in case someone tries to make themselves staff without your consent. You can only get staff via command through the owner. To set yourself as owner, replace my name in ActionSender.java and the command files.

I hope you’re using this link that’s in this thread, cause this is the most updated source. I hope you learn a lot from this source and have fun with it, just as much as I did.

Good luck!

Read full topic

item.title: Goudont - Final release. Noob Friendly | Quests | Minigames | All 25 skills
item.dc:creator: @goudont goudont
item.description:
@goudont wrote:

[quote=“hunterlolz, post:117, topic:544767”]Hi, first of all great stuff you got here! An awesome source and I am having a good time practicing with it. I used to code and host a couple 317s a while ago, and am new to this revision.
Now, I have come across an error where I cannot change combat styles (attack, str, def, controlled). When I click the option, nothing happens. This is during and out of combat as well. I have no clue where to start looking into this. I also have the same error with my created accounts not being able to log in due to the log4j error.
If anyone has any useful insight to my issues, I would very much so appreciate it. Thank you for your time![/quote]

The log4j error shouldn’t interfere with the login.

The attack styles; do you mean that they don’t change the specific exp given or what? If they don’t change the exp given, you can change it all at Player.java in the “addHitExp” method.

Read full topic

item.title: Goudont - Final release. Noob Friendly | Quests | Minigames | All 25 skills
item.dc:creator: @hunterlolz hunterlolz
item.description:
@hunterlolz wrote:

Hi, first of all great stuff you got here! An awesome source and I am having a good time practicing with it. I used to code and host a couple 317s a while ago, and am new to this revision.
Now, I have come across an error where I cannot change combat styles (attack, str, def, controlled). When I click the option, nothing happens. This is during and out of combat as well. I have no clue where to start looking into this. I also have the same error with my created accounts not being able to log in due to the log4j error.
If anyone has any useful insight to my issues, I would very much so appreciate it. Thank you for your time!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Fortwenty:

Anyone knows how to fix this error? https://gyazo.com/633c779264ce64345b6e9712f9b81c96 please contact me on skype Thibo.Baldassarre

Either A) Disable the MySQL.
or
B) Create a MySQL database with the same tables the server requires, and change the data for the MySQL connection.

Do A if you are new to Java, B if you know Java

item.title: Goudont - Final release. Noob Friendly | Quests | Minigames | All 25 skills
item.dc:creator: @goudont goudont
item.description:
@goudont wrote:

[quote=“superpersonxd, post:113, topic:544767”]Optional fix for log4j. Make a new directory in the server folder called properties and in that directory make a new file called log4j.properties. Fill the file with the following

# Set root logger level to DEBUG and its only appender to A1.
log4j.rootLogger=FATAL, A1

# A1 is set to be a ConsoleAppender.
log4j.appender.A1=org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender

# A1 uses PatternLayout.
log4j.appender.A1.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout
log4j.appender.A1.layout.ConversionPattern=%-4r [%t] %-5p %c %x - %m%n

Append the new directory to the classpath when you launch

java -classpath bin;deps/*;properties; com.rs2hd.Main

Related whining in the console about there not being any appenders should now disappear

P.S: Also you CAN use this release with eclipse[/quote]

Thanks for this! It’s not really a problem - doesn’t interfere with the server running, but just to satisfy their outlook, this will help. So thanks for it! I’ll put this in the main post.

Read full topic
item.source: Goudont - Final release. Noob Friendly | Quests | Minigames | All 25 skills

item.title: Goudont - Final release. Noob Friendly | Quests | Minigames | All 25 skills
item.dc:creator: @superpersonxd superpersonxd
item.description:
@superpersonxd wrote:

Optional fix for log4j. Make a new directory in the server folder called properties and in that directory make a new file called log4j.properties. Fill the file with the following

# Set root logger level to DEBUG and its only appender to A1.
log4j.rootLogger=FATAL, A1

# A1 is set to be a ConsoleAppender.
log4j.appender.A1=org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender

# A1 uses PatternLayout.
log4j.appender.A1.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout
log4j.appender.A1.layout.ConversionPattern=%-4r [%t] %-5p %c %x - %m%n

Append the new directory to the classpath when you launch

java -classpath bin;deps/*;properties; com.rs2hd.Main

Related whining in the console about there not being any appenders should now disappear

P.S: Also you CAN use this release with eclipse

Read full topic
